trans-unit.source: Represents a 2-D geometric shape defined by the combination of two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma forma de geométrica 2-D definida pela combinação dos dois <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A> property specifies how the two geometries will be combined.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>propriedade especifica como os dois geometries irão ser combinadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that CombinedGeometry combines the area specified by two geometries, so geometries that do not have area (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) disappear when combined.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que CombinedGeometry combina a área especificada por dois geometries, geometries assim que não tenham área (tais como <xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>) desaparecem quando combinadas.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LineGeometry>

trans-unit.source: Geometries can be combined in several ways: using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, a CombinedGeometry, or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class.
trans-unit.target: Podem ser combinados geometries de várias maneiras: através de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>, um CombinedGeometry, ou o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> creates a composite geometry from one or more <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>cria uma geometria composta a partir de um ou mais <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: - A CombinedGeometry uses a specified boolean operation to combine the area described by two <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> objects.
trans-unit.target: -Um CombinedGeometry utiliza uma operação booleana especificada para combinar área descrita através de dois <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: - The static <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> class behaves in exactly the same manner as the CombinedGeometry object.
trans-unit.target: -A estática <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>método o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>classe funciona exatamente da mesma forma como o objeto de CombinedGeometry.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Combine%2A>

trans-unit.source: Careful thought should be involved when using a CombinedGeometry to perform a union as it can be very CPU-expensive.
trans-unit.target: Deve estar envolvida profundamente ao utilizar um CombinedGeometry para efetuar uma União, tal como pode ser muito CPU dispendiosa.

trans-unit.source: In most cases, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> will work better.
trans-unit.target: Na maioria dos casos, um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>irá funcionar melhor.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryGroup>

trans-unit.source: Use a CombinedGeometry only when any of the following apply: - The geometric operation is not a union.
trans-unit.target: Utilize um CombinedGeometry apenas quando qualquer uma das situações seguintes:-a operação geométrica não é uma União.

trans-unit.source: - Either of the geometries have a <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> and the geometries are self-intersecting (i.e. the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> actually matters).
trans-unit.target: -O as geometries tem um <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>valor <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>e os geometries são Self-intersecting (ou seja, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>, na verdade, é importante).</xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule> </xref:System.Windows.Media.FillRule>

trans-unit.source: - Time is not a concern, but space is (for instance, if the geometry is created once and then cached).
trans-unit.target: -Tempo não é uma preocupação, mas é do espaço (por exemplo, se a geometria é criada uma vez e, em seguida, colocados em cache).

trans-unit.source: Typically, CombinedGeometry produces smaller output than <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, CombinedGeometry produz saída de menor que <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The resulting geometry will be stroked or used in a path animation and <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A> does not provide the desired outline.
trans-unit.target: -A geometria resultante será stroked ou utilizada em animação um caminho e <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>não fornece o contorno pretendido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathGeometry.AddGeometry%2A>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A CombinedGeometry is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Freezable CombinedGeometry de A funcionalidades é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>funcionalidades, como freezing e a clonagem, consulte o [descrição geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual `geometry1` e `geometry2` são combinadas.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> objects, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.GeometryCombineMode*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> objetos, <> </> *>, e <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: The method by which `geometry1` and `geometry2` are combined.
trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual `geometry1` e `geometry2` são combinadas.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"></xref> to combine.
trans-unit.target: O segundo <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Geometry"> </xref> combinar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*> applied to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>aplicado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry.Transform*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that specifies the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> Especifica que a caixa delimitadora deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This method does not take any pens into account.
trans-unit.target: **Nota:** este método não tem qualquer pens em conta.

trans-unit.source: If animations are present, the base values of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> object are used to calculate the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: Se animações estiver presente, os valores da base de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>objeto são utilizados para calcular a caixa delimitadora.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A caixa delimitadora deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref>, efetuar cópias profundas de valores deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Quando copiar propriedades de dependência, este método copia enlaces de referências e os dados de recursos (mas já não poderão resolver), mas não animações ou os respetivos valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável deste <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto, tornando profundas cópias dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: As referências de recurso, enlaces de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Este método é utilizado para produzir modificável cópias congeladas <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua comodidade, este método funciona como sombra a versão herdada por uma implementação com tipo seguro.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade serão <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> , mesmo se a origem <> </> *> propriedade foi <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method by which the two geometries (specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry1*> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry.Geometry2*> properties) are combined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o método pelo qual as dois geometries (especificada pelo <> </> *> e <> </> *> propriedades) são combinados.

trans-unit.target: O método pelo qual <> </> *> e <> </> *> são combinadas.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryCombineMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém a área da região de manchas.

trans-unit.source: The computational tolerance of error.
trans-unit.target: A tolerância computacional do erro.

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the error tolerance will be interpreted.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a forma como a tolerância de erro será devem ser interpretada.

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this combined geometry.
trans-unit.target: A área da região de manchas deste combinado de geometria.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto está vazio.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> está vazio; caso contrário, **falso**.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: Determina se este <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter curved segmentos.

trans-unit.source: **true** if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"></xref> object may have curved segments; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **Verdadeiro** se <xref href="System.Windows.Media.CombinedGeometry"> </xref> objeto pode ter curved segmentos; caso contrário, **falso**.
